Package cycling

Class Stage

java.lang.Object
cycling.IdHaver
cycling.Stage
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Stage extends IdHaver implements Serializable
Represents a stage within a race.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Stage

      public Stage(int raceId, String stageName, String description, double length, LocalDateTime startTime, StageType type)
      Constructor for the Stage class.
      Parameters:
      raceId - ID of the race the stage belongs to.
      stageName - Name of the stage
      description - Description of the stage
      length - Length of the stage in kilometers
      startTime - Date and time of the start of the stage
      type - The type of the stage (determines how many points winners get)

  • Method Details

    • addRiderResultToStage

      public void addRiderResultToStage(RiderStageResults rider)
      Adds rider's results in stage to riderResultsList.
      Parameters:
      rider - Rider object of the corresponding rider

    • addSegment

      public void addSegment(Segment segment)
      Adds a segment to the stage (adds segment object to stage's list of segments).
      Parameters:
      segment - Segment object to be added.

    • removeSegment

      public void removeSegment(Segment segment)
      Removes specified segment object from stage's list of segments.
      Parameters:
      segment - Segment object to be removed.

    • deleteSegments

      public void deleteSegments()
      Removes all segments from the stage's list of segments.

    • getSegments

      public LinkedList<Segment> getSegments()
      Sorts the list of segments by their position within the stage and returns the sorted list.
      Returns:
      List of segments ordered by their location/poistion in the stage.

      Gets the starting time of the stage.

    • getStageState

      public String getStageState()
      Gets the current state of the stage i.e. waiting for results.
      Returns:
      stage state

      Concludes the stage preparation.

      public static void resetIdCounter()
      Reset the number of stages, used when erasing the cycling portal.
